hadiths.text: Narrated Abdullah ibn Mas'ud: The Prophet (ﷺ) said: None of my Companions must tell me anything about anyone, for I like to come out to you with no ill-feelings

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي رَفْعِ الْحَدِيثِ مِنَ الْمَجْلِسِ
chapter.eng-name: Conveying negative information from a gathering
